hero.label: INTRODUCTION
hero.name: Paul
hero.description: This website is a rudimentary demo that I coded for now, as I'm still developing my own design system. However, it will take some more time to complete.

aboutMe.label: ABOUT_ME
aboutMe.text1: I'm a creative free spirit with many ideas who optimizes his environment and supports family and friends with technical knowledge. Some might say I'm annoying them with it, but I just want to bring out the best in everyone.
aboutMe.text2: My passion lies in simplifying complex processes and working more productively with the right tools. This website shows a small glimpse into my workflow.

tools.label: TOOLS
tools.intro: These tools accompany me daily and help me work more productively and bring creative ideas to life.

desc.raycast: A powerful launcher for macOS that boosts my productivity with quick commands, snippets, and extensions.
desc.dia: A modern browser with AI features that helps me work and research more efficiently on the web.
desc.notion: My central tool for notes, projects, and knowledge management. Everything organized in one place.
desc.antigravity: An AI-powered coding assistant that helps me develop projects and accelerates my workflow.
desc.claude-ai: An advanced AI assistant by Anthropic that supports me with research, writing, and complex questions.
desc.figma: My design tool of choice for UI/UX work, prototyping, and collaborative design.
desc.canva: Perfect for quick graphics, social media posts, and presentations with a professional look.
desc.notebooklm: An AI-powered notebook by Google that helps me understand and analyze complex documents.

projects.label: PROJECTS
projects.notice: These web apps are currently still in development but are continuously being improved with updates and new features.

desc.xool: An innovative web app that simplifies learning processes and enables personalized learning.
desc.parabook: A digital notebook based on the PARA system that simplifies knowledge management.
desc.notizapp: A minimalistic note-taking application focused on simplicity and quick capture.

contact.label: CONTACT
contact.intro: Have questions, ideas, or just want to say hello? I'd love to hear from you!
